    <metadata>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_95539</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sound waves and radio waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schallwellen und Funkwellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vagues saines et ondes radio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas sadias e ondas de rádio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde sonore ed onde radio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υγιή κύματα και ραδιο κύματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas acústicas y ondas de radio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the Big Ben. This can be used to demonstrate the speeds of sound and radio waves.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Big Ben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sound wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das grosse Ben. 
Dieses kann verwendet werden, um die Schallgeschwindigkeiten und
Funkwellen zu demonstrieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le grand Ben. 
Ceci peut être employé pour démontrer les vitesses du bruit 
et des ondes radio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o Ben grande. Isto
pode ser usado demonstrar as velocidades de som e das ondas de rádio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il Ben grande. 
Ciò può essere usata per dimostrare le velocità del suono e 
delle onde radio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το Big Ben. 
Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να καταδείξει τις 
ταχύτητες των υγιών και ραδιο κυμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el Ben grande. 
Esto se puede utilizar para demostrar las velocidades del sonido
y de las ondas de radio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grosses Ben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funkwelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
